name: FroggyFrisk
description:
Play as a frog who's late for his date and has to hurry to make it in time before his crush loses her interest! Do so by using your tongue to swing through the level and get there as soon as possible.

This is FroggyFrisk, my final submission project for my Game Design Degree at LSBU. I'm an aspired Game / Level Designer.

The plan is to work on this game post-graduation to add more levels and further improve the gameplay and everything around it.

I'm very happy to receive any kind of feedback.

Special thanks to Joshua Jo-Nes (https://soujah.itch.io/) for assistance in programming, as well as Axada Rai () for the Logo.

Also thanks to all the other members of the Game Design Degree for feedback and support throughout the year. :)
